content.rendered:
Directed by Mano Ve Kannathasan

Written by Mano Ve Kannathasan

Star Rajesh Balachandiran (Kumar). ShreeRaj (Mithun). Amrutha Srinivasan (Iyal). Anuri. Arun. Arvind. Praven Balu. Dayalan. Deepika. Dharanya. Lokesh Elangovan. Govindaraj. Girija Hari. Kirubakar. Kishore Raj Kumar. Raj Kumar. Manoj. Narmadha. Saravanan Palanichamy. Pavithra. Pasupathi Raj. Kishore Rajkumar. Vignesh Raju. Vignesh Shanmugam (Prasanth). Shanthi. Archisha Shri. Shyam. Swayam Siddha. Sumesh. Sanjay Suresh. Surya. Thileeban. Mano Ve Kannathasan

Language Tamil

Producers Kirubakar Jayaraman. Silambarasan Perumal. Selvi Venkatachalam

Production Insomniacs dream creations
